description:
What This Course Is About?

This is an introductory LinkedIn course on how to leverage your LinkedIn profile as a Lead Generation tool for your business.

LinkedIn has over 364 Million users in 200 countries around the globe and is by far one of, if not the best (in my opinion) generators of corporate website traffic available currently.

Course Summary

This Free LinkedIn course will introduce the tips and strategies that you can easily implement in your own LinkedIn Profile in a straight forward, no jargon & common sense approach:

  • How To Optimise Your LinkedIn Profile & Increase Your LinkedIn Search Ranking
  • How ANYONE Can Avoid Common Mistakes That Your Competition Makes On LinkedIn.
  • How YOU Can Leverage The Power Of LinkedIn Groups For Your Business To Generate a Constant Stream Of Qualified Leads.
  • How To Easily Target & Engage With Decision Makers Without The Need To Deal With 'Gate Keepers'.

Who Is This LinkedIn Course Suited For?

This LinkedIn course is best suited for ANY:

  • Business Owner
  • Executive Manager
  • Line Manager
  • Business Professionals
  • Sales & Lead Generators

That are looking to learn a cost effective (in most situations implementing these strategies will cost ZERO marketing dollars) ways to:

  • Grow Their Business
  • Increase The Level & Quality Of Their Leads
  • Increase Sales
  • Increase Revenue
  • Make Better Use Of Their Time
  • Be Seen As An Expert Within Their Chosen Field.

Course Requirements & Assumptions

  • An Active LinkedIn Profile Is Required
  • You have a 100% Completed LinkedIn Profile & Have a 'All Star' status

How Long Will It Take To Complete This LinkedIn Course?

Anyone with a reasonable working knowledge of LinkedIn should be able to complete this introductory LinkedIn course in 30-45 minutes.

Instructional Level

This LinkedIn course is suitable for people at ALL Levels
title: Lead Generation Basics: Turn Your Connections Into Clients
